last_episode_to_air.name: The Perfect Perfect Show Again Again / Abraham Lincoln
last_episode_to_air.overview: The neighbors lobby to perform live on the last show of the season. Abraham Lincoln needs to get to Gettysburg ... but he doesn't know the address.

name: The Mr. Peabody & Sherman Show
overview: The world's smartest dog and his boy host a zany late-night comedy show from a swanky penthouse, with time-traveling historical figures and a live audience.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Mr. Peabody and Sherman are hosting an exciting, new late-night comedy show, complete with time travel, musical guests and outrageous neighbors.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Peabody and Sherman's time-traveling adventures take them from the Old West to spooky Easter Island, stinky 16th-century England and more.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: Peabody and Sherman add big names to their ever-growing roster of guests, from Ada Lovelace and Frédéric Bartholdi to John Muir and Johnny Appleseed.

seasons.name: Season 4
seasons.overview: Peabody and Sherman must defeat an evil cyborg and fix the course of history. Zaniness continues at the penthouse, and our heroes switch bodies!

episodes.name: The Perfect Show / Napoleon
episodes.overview: Peabody and Sherman's first show goes off the rails when their celebrity-crazed neighbors won't leave. Napoleon throws a temper tantrum over dessert.

episodes.name: Stuck / Mozart
episodes.overview: Peabody tries to play an Irish jig while trapped in the elevator. Mozart blows his big piano audition and lands everyone in jail.

episodes.name: Sherman's Pet / Marco Polo
episodes.overview: Sherman begs Peabody to keep a woolly mammoth as his pet. Marco Polo wins three deadly noodle challenges and discovers spaghetti.

episodes.name: Handcuffs for a Song / Wright Bros
episodes.overview: Christine won't release Peabody from handcuffs until he lets her sing. The Wright brothers must get their plane back from a flock of angry birds.

episodes.name: New Sponsor / Cleopatra
episodes.overview: Sherman goes gaga when his favorite snack in the world, Guapo Taco Pudding, sponsors the show. Beautiful Cleopatra turns out to be a belching queen.

episodes.name: Black Hole / Winston Churchill
episodes.overview: Peabody and Sherman accidentally create a black hole after skipping their chores. Winston Churchill hides in a baby nursery to avoid work.

episodes.name: Big Boy / Blackbeard
episodes.overview: Sherman brings back a giant man-baby after he loses a neighbor's son in the WABAC. Blackbeard battles a bully pirate to get his mojo and beard back.

episodes.name: Biggest Fan / Queen Isabella
episodes.overview: Shelby, Peabody and Sherman's biggest fan, accidentally gets sucked into the show. Queen Isabella falls for a scam and loses all her money.

episodes.name: Peabody's Parents / Galileo
episodes.overview: Peabody's non-talking dog parents arrive for an unexpected visit. Galileo makes the world go dark when he crashes his spaceship and breaks the sun.

episodes.name: Patch Games / Mark Twain
episodes.overview: Sherman's scout troop, the Laser Robot Tiger Troopers, earn their merit badges on the show. Mark Twain's gift for gab wins back his lucky typewriter.

episodes.name: Favor for Christine / Lady Godiva
episodes.overview: Christine tries to impress her twin sister by pretending to host the show and marry Peabody. Lady Godiva hides in a cake and joins a drum circle.

episodes.name: Medieval Fest / John Sutter
episodes.overview: Sherman lets Mr. Hobson ride Captain Cools to beat Joan of Arc in a jousting competition. John Sutter creates a pig rush to discover the gold rush.

episodes.name: Outbreak / Ancient Greek Games
episodes.overview: Sherman accidentally finds the cure for a prehistoric bird flu that's turning everyone blue. Zeus's Titans face off against a gawky geek squad.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: Mr. Peabody and Sherman are hosting an exciting, new late-night comedy show, complete with time travel, musical guests and outrageous neighbors.

episodes.name: Show on the Road / Catherine the Great
episodes.overview: A malfunctioning machine strands Peabody, Sherman and their whole audience on the moon. Catherine the Great invents the world's first roller coaster.

episodes.name: Scrambled Eggs / George Stephenson
episodes.overview: Sherman and Boogaz pair up as egg parents for a school project. Engineer George Stephenson needs Peabody and Sherman's help stopping a runaway train.

episodes.name: Big Top Peabody / Taj Mahal
episodes.overview: Ringmaster Peabody and temporarily tattooed Sherman host a circus-themed show. Sweet Tune, Sherman and Peabody pursue a band of thieving monkeys.

episodes.name: World Records / Hotu Matu'a
episodes.overview: Sherman is determined to set a world record. When Easter Island's famous statues come to life, it's clear that King Hotu Matu'a has something to hide.

episodes.name: Sherman From A to Zzzz / Akashi Shiganosuke
episodes.overview: Sleepy Sherman struggles to stay awake during the show. Superstitious sumo wrestler Akashi Shiganosuke decides to become a Kabuki dancer instead.

episodes.name: Orchoptitron in Love / John Harrington
episodes.overview: Orchoptitron is depressed because his girlfriend dumped him. John Harrington makes the 1500s smell a lot better when he invents the toilet.

episodes.name: Inside Hobson / Annie Oakley
episodes.overview: Mr. Hobson accidentally eats a shrunken Sherman. Teenage Annie Oakley shows off her sharpshooting skills in the Old West.

episodes.name: Peabody's Diet / Ponce de Leon
episodes.overview: Pudgy Peabody can't stop eating. Spanish conquistador Ponce de León is looking for the Fountain of Youth, but he has a very short attention span.

episodes.name: Secret Agent Sherman / Alexander Cartwright
episodes.overview: A sophisticated spy shares his cool secret agent gadgets with Peabody. Alexander Cartwright invents baseball, but he keeps changing the rules!

episodes.name: Sherman Exchange Program / Charles Dickens
episodes.overview: Sherman swaps places with an 11-year-old emperor from ancient China. Angry ghosts keep Charles Dickens from finishing his novel "A Christmas Carol."

episodes.name: Ruff Guyz / George Crum
episodes.overview: Archaeologist Sherman digs up a secret from Peabody's past. Sherman and Peabody can't stop snacking on George Crum's tasty invention: the potato chip!

episodes.name: I Knew That Was Gonna Happen / Sacagawea
episodes.overview: Nostradamus delivers a cryptic riddle on Family Fun Night. In 1805, Sacagawea helps Peabody and Sherman track down explorers Lewis and Clark.

episodes.name: The Perfect Show Again / Aristophanes
episodes.overview: Cleopatra, Mark Twain and other disgruntled guests stage a protest during the show's finale. Aristophanes's jokes flop when his comic muse flees.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: Peabody and Sherman's time-traveling adventures take them from the Old West to spooky Easter Island, stinky 16th-century England and more.

episodes.name: The Wrath of Hughes
episodes.overview: Peabody and Sherman confront bizarro versions of themselves after entering an alternate reality that's ruled by a cyborg Mrs. Hughes.

episodes.name: Jump the Whale Shark / Frédéric Bartholdi
episodes.overview: A beachy-keen Sherman squashes a rival by jumping the shark. Famed sculptor Frédéric Bartholdi learns to stand up to his overbearing mother.

episodes.name: Pea Dummy / Mary Anning
episodes.overview: After scoring surprisingly low on an IQ test, a time-traveling Peabody meets his match in brainy Mary Anning, the world's first female paleontologist.

episodes.name: Climate Control / Ziryab
episodes.overview: Our hot-and-cold co-hosts come to blows over the temperature inside the studio. Distracted designer Ziryab unveils his vision for a royal wedding.

episodes.name: Brain Switch / Koikawa Harumachi
episodes.overview: Everything's off-kilter when Peabody and Sherman attempt to swap brains. Comic book inventor Koikawa Harumachi unleashes a literary monster.

episodes.name: Super Sherman / Ada Lovelace
episodes.overview: Sherman gains unexplained superpowers when a meteor hits the penthouse. Messy math whiz Ada Lovelace writes the code for the world's first computer.

episodes.name: Mouse Hunt / David Bushnell
episodes.overview: A mouse on the loose in the penthouse makes Peabody's skin crawl. The inventor of the world's first submarine sets out to find a sea monster.

episodes.name: Sweet Little Lies / Allan Pinkerton
episodes.overview: Peabody vows to teach Sherman that honesty is the best policy. Pioneering private eye Allan Pinkerton searches for a stash of stolen diamonds.

episodes.name: Tree House / Queen Hatshepsut
episodes.overview: A visit from Johnny Appleseed turns the studio into a woodsy wonderland. Self-absorbed pharaoh Queen Hatshepsut opens up the world’s first zoo.

episodes.name: This Is Your Life? / Robert Edwin Peary
episodes.overview: Peabody and Sherman help Hobson cross items off his bucket list. Explorer Robert Peary's historic North Pole trek takes a detour to Santa's workshop.

episodes.name: Telethon / Enrico Caruso
episodes.overview: Sherman hosts a telethon to help his school -- and win a prize. A time-traveling Peabody steps in to prove opera star Enrico Caruso's innocence.

episodes.name: Spooktacular / Nicholas-Joseph Cugnot
episodes.overview: A spook-tacular show turns Peabody and Sherman into monsters. The inventor of the world's first automobile is also one of the world's worst drivers.

episodes.name: Return of the Guapos / Lucy Walker
episodes.overview: The Guapo Brothers' rival talk show steals Peabody and Sherman's audience. Mountaineering maven Lucy Walker makes history on the Matterhorn.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: Peabody and Sherman add big names to their ever-growing roster of guests, from Ada Lovelace and Frédéric Bartholdi to John Muir and Johnny Appleseed.

episodes.name: Return of the Guapos Part 2
episodes.overview: The Guapo Brothers offer to give Peabody and Sherman their show back. But first, they'll have to capture Jesse James, Belle Starr and Genghis Khan.

episodes.name: Return of the Guapos Part 3
episodes.overview: With the outlaws still on the loose, Peabody rushes to protect the Federal Reserve Bank while Sherman attends a school friend's birthday party.

episodes.name: Magic Hiccups / Gaius Maecenas
episodes.overview: Peabody and Sherman shun electricity for a show about Colonial America. Ancient Rome's Gaius Maecenas is short on water for his heated pool party.

episodes.name: Sherman's Tooth / Voyager Gold Record
episodes.overview: A loose-toothed Sherman sees America's first dentist. Peabody and Sherman fly to the 1970s to find a Golden Record for NASA's Voyager launch.

episodes.name: Gone Comic Gone / Harry Houdini
episodes.overview: Sherman's missing comic book steals focus from a show about the Dewey Decimal System. Harry Houdini learns the art of restraint.

episodes.name: P-Bro / First Canine Police Force
episodes.overview: Agamemnon brings his band of brothers back from ancient Greece. Peabody and Sherman help history's first canine police force catch a gaseous criminal.

episodes.name: Cheerleaders / Mansa Musa
episodes.overview: Sherman's determined to win a high-stakes cheerleading competition. A wealthy emperor in West Africa won't stop making extravagant purchases.

episodes.name: Bring Your Kids To Work Day / Leif Erikson
episodes.overview: Bring Your Kids to Work Day brings chaos into the studio. Famed Viking explorer Leif Erikson offends Odin with his sophisticated tastes.

episodes.name: Orchopti-NOT-ron / Mulan
episodes.overview: Super fan Maria hosts the show when Peabody and Sherman get trapped inside Orchoptitron. Christine's meddling threatens to derail Mulan's destiny.

episodes.name: The Show's The Thing / Peter Cooper
episodes.overview: Famed playwright William Shakespeare refuses to cast Peabody in his dream role. Inventor Peter Cooper injects a little too much life into his gelatin.

episodes.name: Peabody's Delivery / Joe vs. the Peabody and Sherman
episodes.overview: It's a wild day in the studio when an angry koala eats a local guide. Peabody meets the sausage maker who inspired him to invent the WABAC.

episodes.name: Seen It / Edgar Allan Poe
episodes.overview: A nasty heckler pushes Peabody and Sherman out of their comfort zones. A lovestruck Edgar Allan Poe can't seem to find his dark side.

episodes.name: The Perfect Perfect Show Again Again / Abraham Lincoln
episodes.overview: The neighbors lobby to perform live on the last show of the season. Abraham Lincoln needs to get to Gettysburg ... but he doesn't know the address.

4.name: Season 4
4.overview: Peabody and Sherman must defeat an evil cyborg and fix the course of history. Zaniness continues at the penthouse, and our heroes switch bodies!
